Congratulations! You have now become a proud Dark Elf Spellhowler. Life as a Spellhowler may still be unfamiliar, but do not be anxious -- you can learn what you need to know one step at a time from the masters nearby.
May you become a strong Spellhowler who proclaims the name of Shilen to the world.
Our guild has prepared this small gift to assist you in your journey. Take this to the Grand Master, Grand Magister, Master Trainer or High Priest who permits transfers in any major town and you will be able to exchange it for a usable Shadow Weapon.
